gbmj.protocol.server



interface Server;


abstract IDealTiles start();


abstract ServerReactionDealt accept(ClientDealtTiles clientDealtTiles);


abstract ServerReactionDealError accept(ClientDealError clientDealError);


abstract ServerReactionHu accept(ClientHuSelfdrawn clientHu);


abstract ServerReactionDiscard accept(ClientDiscard clientDiscard);
